code: public void testRefreshWithBlocks() {     createIndex("test").     ensureGreen("test").     NumShards numShards = getNumShards("test").     // Request is not blocked     for (String blockSetting : Arrays.asList(SETTING_BLOCKS_READ, SETTING_BLOCKS_WRITE, SETTING_READ_ONLY, SETTING_BLOCKS_METADATA, SETTING_READ_ONLY_ALLOW_DELETE)) {         try {             enableIndexBlock("test", blockSetting).             RefreshResponse response = client().admin().indices().prepareRefresh("test").execute().actionGet().             assertNoFailures(response).             assertThat(response.getSuccessfulShards(), equalTo(numShards.totalNumShards)).         } finally {             disableIndexBlock("test", blockSetting).         }     } }
